channel.title: Calculator on João's site

item.title: Derivative Calculator
item.description: Function Variable var a = function(e) { if (e.keyCode == 13) document.getElementById('calc').click(); } document.getElementById('formInput').onkeypress = a document.getElementById('varInput').onkeypress = a .......... How to use Put the function in the first line Put the variable you want to derivate in at the second line Click on the “Calculate” button and see the derivative! Valid functions and variables Variables can be an upper or lower case letter (excluding “e”), and can have subscript using “_”, ex.
